verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:30
verses.text: And they that weep, as though they wept not; and they that rejoice, as though they rejoiced not; and they that buy, as though they possessed not;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:31
verses.text: And they that use this world, as not abusing it: for the fashion of this world passeth away.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:32
verses.text: But I would have you without carefulness. He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:33
verses.text: But he that is married careth for the things that are of the world, how he may please his wife.
